sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Get approval from Requested for's Manager

sys_element_mapping.value:
Request Trigger➛NeedIt Record➛Number has been approved by Trigger➛NeedIt Record➛Requested for➛Manager➛Name.

Comments：

 5➛Approval Record➛Comments

Request Trigger➛NeedIt Record➛Number has been rejected by Trigger➛NeedIt Record➛Requested for➛Manager➛Name.

Comments:

 9➛Approval Record➛Comments
